alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 26 at 8:37PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain continues to be possible WHERE...All Islands WHEN...until 1 am early Wednesday morning IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause ponding on the roadways and rapidly rising streams throughout the territory. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The risk for landslides remains as grounds are already saturated. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 827 Po Aso Lua Tesema 26 2023 ...UA IAI LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE 3 I LE AOAULI O LE ASO LULU... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai i timuga mamafa. NOFOAGA...Motu uma o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le 1 vaveao o le Aso Lulu AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa e mafai ona lolovaia ai luga o auala tele. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O timuga mamafa ma le susu o le eleele e ono solo ai mauga ma eleele. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleele, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
